article.title: Northrop Grumman To Supply Radar Systems To Navy Submarines
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: U.S. Naval Sea Systems Command has awarded Northrop Grumman Corporation's Sperry Marine business unit a $20.9 million contract to supply navigation radar systems for eight new Navy nuclear attack submarines. The contract calls for Sperry Marine to produce and deliver eight AN/BPS-16(v)5 radar sets to be intalled on Virginia class Block III submarines.
